Title: Hyperspectral imaging + ML for grains
Query: (hyperspectral OR HSI OR "NIR-HSI" OR "Vis-NIR" OR SWIR OR FTIR OR spectroscopy OR "near-infrared spectroscopy" OR NIR) AND (grain OR wheat OR barley OR oats OR corn OR maize OR soybean OR canola OR rapeseed OR sorghum) AND ("machine learning" OR "deep learning" OR CNN OR transformer)

Title: Attention modules and efficient architectures
Query: (CBAM OR "Convolutional Block Attention Module" OR EfficientNet OR "EfficientNet B0" OR "attention mechanism" OR "self-attention") AND (grain OR wheat OR barley OR corn OR maize OR soybean OR seed) AND (classification OR grading OR inspection OR recognition)

Title: Explainable AI + model updating + drift
Query: (explainable OR XAI OR SHAP OR "model updating" OR incremental OR "online learning" OR drift OR "domain adaptation" OR "transfer learning") AND (grain OR wheat OR barley OR corn OR maize OR soybean OR seed) AND (classification OR grading OR inspection OR recognition)

Query: (mycotoxin OR deoxynivalenol OR DON OR aflatoxin OR fumonisin OR "T-2" OR "HT-2" OR zearalenone OR OTA) AND (grain OR wheat OR barley OR oats OR corn OR maize) AND (hyperspectral OR HSI OR NIR OR spectroscopy OR "machine learning" OR "deep learning")
